detaileddescription.para: Provides the content for the Controlled vocabulary home page.
An ajax callback to get the children of a term.

parameterdescription.para: The short name of the vocabulary (e.g. SO, GO, etc.)

simplesect.para: A JSON array compatible with the JSTree library. https://www.jstree.com/docs/json/

detaileddescription.para: A helper function to format an array of terms into a list for the web page.
Provides the content for a single controlled vocabulary.
